info.description:
[![](https://img.shields.io/pypi/v/django-postgres-createdb.svg?maxAge=3600)](https://pypi.org/project/django-postgres-createdb/) [![](https://img.shields.io/badge/License-Unlicense-blue.svg?longCache=True)](https://unlicense.org/) ### Installation ```bash $ [sudo] pip install django-postgres-createdb ``` #### Examples example 1 - management command: `settings.py` ```python INSTALLED_APPS+=['django_postgres_createdb'] DATABASES = { 'default': { 'ENGINE': 'django.db.backends.postgresql', 'NAME': os.getenv('DB_NAME'), 'USER': os.getenv('DB_USER'), 'PASSWORD': os.getenv('DB_PASS'), 'HOST': os.getenv('DB_HOST'), 'PORT': os.getenv('DB_PORT'), } } ``` ```bash $ python manage.py createdb $ python manage.py createdb "default" ``` example 2 - python module cli: `settings.py` ```python DATABASES = { 'default': { 'ENGINE': 'django.db.backends.postgresql', 'NAME': os.getenv('DB_NAME'), 'USER': os.getenv('DB_USER'), 'PASSWORD': os.getenv('DB_PASS'), 'HOST': os.getenv('DB_HOST'), 'PORT': os.getenv('DB_PORT'), } } ``` ```bash $ export DJANGO_SETTINGS_MODULE=settings $ python -m django_postgres_createdb $ python -m django_postgres_createdb "default" ``` #### Related + [django-postgres-createdb](https://pypi.org/project/django-postgres-createdb/) + [django-postgres-dropdb](https://pypi.org/project/django-postgres-dropdb/)
